resource_dependency.databaseSchema_companyInfo: Table 'company_info' with columns: id (primary key), history (text), mission (text), values (text)

function: Display the company's history, mission, and values fetched dynamically from the backend.
static_description: A section titled 'About Us' with three subsections: 'Our History', 'Our Mission', and 'Our Values'. Each subsection displays text content retrieved from the backend API. Background uses lemon chiffon (#FFFACD) and component layer uses chocolate (#D2691E).

interaction_and_states.description: As users scroll through this section, content remains visible without triggering additional actions.

resource_dependency.databaseSchema_products: Table 'products' with columns: id (primary key), name (string), description (text), image_url (string), price (decimal)

function: Showcase products with detailed information fetched from the backend.
static_description: A grid-based layout presenting multiple product cards. Each card includes an image, title, brief description, and a 'View Details' button. Background uses lemon chiffon (#FFFACD) and component layer uses chocolate (#D2691E).

interaction_and_states.description: Clicking on a product card navigates to a dedicated product detail page or expands the current view to show more details.

resource_dependency.databaseSchema_news: Table 'news' with columns: id (primary key), title (string), summary (text), date_published (timestamp), full_content (text)

function: Display latest news and events related to the company.
static_description: A vertical timeline or list view showing news items with titles, summaries, publication dates, and links to read more. Background uses lemon chiffon (#FFFACD) and component layer uses chocolate (#D2691E).

interaction_and_states.description: Clicking on a news item opens the full article in a modal or separate page.

resource_dependency.validationRules: Name must be non-empty string; Email must match standard email format; Message must be at least 10 characters long

function: Allow users to send messages via a contact form with validation.
static_description: A contact form containing labeled input fields for Name, Email, and Message, along with a Submit button. All inputs are styled with chocolate borders and backgrounds when active. Background uses lemon chiffon (#FFFACD).

interaction_and_states.description: Upon clicking Submit, client-side validation checks all fields. If valid, the form data is sent to the backend endpoint. Invalid entries trigger inline error messages.
Each field highlights with a chocolate border when focused.

function: Apply consistent background and component colors across all pages.
static_description: All pages use lemon chiffon (#FFFACD) as the base background color. Component layers such as headers, buttons, and cards utilize chocolate (#D2691E) for visual contrast.

function: Provide site-wide navigation linking to all main sections.
static_description: A horizontal navigation bar fixed at the top featuring five clickable links aligned left-to-right: Home, About, Products, News, Contact. Styled with chocolate text over lemon chiffon background.

interaction_and_states.description: Clicking any link scrolls smoothly to the corresponding section or loads the relevant page.
Menu items highlight slightly under hover with a semi-transparent overlay.

resource_dependency.responsiveBreakpoints: { mobile: max-width 768px, tablet: min-width 769px and max-width 1024px, desktop: min-width 1025px }

function: Ensure responsive design compatible with various device sizes.
static_description: Layout adjusts fluidly between mobile, tablet, and desktop views. Navigation becomes hamburger-styled on small screens. Grid layouts reflow accordingly.

interaction_and_states.description: UI elements automatically adapt their size and positioning based on viewport dimensions.

resource_dependency.seoMetadata_template: Each route defines unique <title> and <meta name="description"> tags generated server-side.

function: Generate SEO-friendly metadata for improved search engine visibility.
static_description: Each HTML document includes dynamically rendered <title> and <meta name="description"> tags reflecting the content of that specific page or section.

resource_dependency.accessibilityStandards: WCAG 2.1 AA compliance enforced using semantic HTML and ARIA roles where needed

function: Support accessibility features including keyboard navigation and screen readers.
static_description: All interactive elements are focusable and operable via keyboard. Semantic HTML tags and ARIA attributes enhance screen reader interpretation.

interaction_and_states.description: Users can navigate sequentially through interactive elements using Tab key.
Activates buttons and links when focused.

function: Indicate loading states during asynchronous data fetching.
static_description: A centered spinner animation appears wherever content is being fetched from an API until the request completes.

interaction_and_states.description: Spinner activates immediately upon initiating fetch call.
Spinner disappears once data is received and rendered.

resource_dependency.errorHandling_strategy: Display user-friendly error message overlays or banners indicating failure status

function: Handle errors gracefully during API calls or database connections.
static_description: In case of failed API requests or database issues, a dismissible banner shows a generic but informative error message above affected sections.

interaction_and_states.description: Error banner slides down from the top of the affected area stating: "Failed to load content. Please try again later."
Clicking close icon hides the error notification temporarily.
